name: Ileris Tik'kla
content:
Ileris Tik'kla was a female Caamasi who acted as an Ambassador for the Rebel Alliance early in the Galactic Civil War. Along with her aid Niak, she was assigned to negotiate with ambasssador Woz Kaza for weapons for the Alliance. Tik'kla was able to get Kaza's family diverted away from the Empire.
Ileris Tik'kla appears in the opening story in Fantasy Flight Games' 2015 roleplaying game sourcebook Desperate Allies.
